original_text: The Lord said to me, ‘It is true that Israel's people have not been faithful to me. But Judah's people are even more guilty than them. 3: Judah was more guilty than Israel because she saw how God punished The Lord said to me, ‘It is true that Israel's people have not been faithful to me. But Judah's people are even more guilty than them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 배역한 이스라엘은 반역한 유다보다 자신이 더 의로움이 나타났나니

sentences.original_text: It is true that Israel's people
have not been faithful to me
are even more guilty than them
Judah was more guilty than Israel
because she saw how God punished
